title: Sudan war: A boy's escape from el-Fasher amid accusations of spying
description: A 12-year-old tells the BBC that in the chaos he lost contact with his family and is now on his own at a camp.
content:
Twelve-year-old Abdiwahab - not his real name - sobs as he recounts what happened to him as he escaped from the western Sudanese city of el-Fasher.
The young boy left el-Fasher on Sunday as it fell to the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF), the ... [4177 chars]

title: Houses without lounges are a reality for renters
description: Nearly a third of homes advertised on a property sharing website had no living room.
content:
Homes without lounges are becoming a reality for renters on tight budgets faced with a lack of available lets.
Nearly a third of homes advertised on flat-sharing website SpareRoom in the first half of the year had no living room.

title: Hair transplants, finasteride and hair systems: Welcome to the world of hair restoration
description: There are multiple ways for men to combat hair loss now, but should they have to?
content:
​​I'm bald, and that bothered me for a long time. ​​
It bothered me that I was bothered. But just one swipe down my Instagram feed reveals I'm not the only man who is self-conscious about his hair.

title: Kieffer Moore hat-trick brings Coventry’s unbeaten run to an end at Wrexham
description: Kieffer Moore scored a second-half hat-trick as Wrexham beat Championship leaders Coventry 3-2 at STōK Cae Ras
content:
Kieffer Moore downed Coventry with a perfect second-half hat-trick as Wrexham won 3-2 to inflict a first league defeat on the Championship leaders.
